member.name: ICreateObject.CreateObject
member.summary: Creates a local object of a specified class and returns a pointer to a specified interface on the object.
member.param: A pointer to the interface that aggregates the object created by this function, or NULL if no aggregation is desired.
A reference to the IID of the interface the created object should return.
When this method returns, contains the address of the pointer to the interface requested in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateObject
member.summary: Exposes a method that creates an object of a specified class.
